name: Baja Breakfast Bowl
description: A quick, delicious breakfast, or make it "brinner"!

ingredients.name: water or Nourish Broth or Vegetable Broth

preparation: Place warm polenta into a serving bowl.
Add kale and warmed beans and top with salsa and guacamole.
Preheat a lightly greased frying pan on medium heat. Crack egg into pan and let cook for 1–2 minutes, or until the egg white begins to turn solid.
Top bowl with egg, season with salt and pepper, if desired, and serve.
tips: Flavour the polenta with your favourite flavours: Poco Picante Salsa Mix and Guacamole Dip Mix are great for this recipe.
Make it Vegan: Swap egg for tofu and use soy cheese.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a Perfectly Balanced Plate.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chillies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!
